channel.title: Whonix Wiki in Spanish
channel.description: Today I have some free time and I finished the main page, I wanted to know How can I upload the translated images into Spanish? [https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Main_Page/es](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Main_Page/es)

item.title: Whonix Wiki in Spanish
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Sadly, due to the design and after-market nature of the translation plugin, it is currently not possible to offer different media for different languages. That sadly includes images.

Either way, please let me thank you again for your support.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
